posts.post_content:
I have complete run of 1887 Detroit OJs but still need some poses of the 1888 Detroit introductions (I'd pay handsomely for these cards):
Lady Baldwin
Pete Conway
Pretzel Getzien
Barney Gilligan
Frank Scheibeck
Deacon White

I also need some of the poses for the following 1889 International Association Detroits:
Count Campau
Mike Goodfellow
John McGlone

Beyond OJs, I'm always looking for Tomlinson cabinets, N173, N175, and Detroit type cards from G&B, Yum Yum, & SF Hess.  I collect just about anything Detroit except N284 & Scrapps.

I have cash and some trade material (Detroit and otherwise).

[url]detroitwolverines@gmail.com[/url]

Bump, its been awhile.
